resources.string: Dont have an account? Signup here!
We NEVER share any of your data with anyone!
You should shower in x hrs
Please enter your weight, height and age for accuracy
Help us calculate when you should shower by entering your gender, weight and age.
Everything is done automatically, enter a few details about yourself and we take care of the rest
Allow permissions to the pedometer and see the magic happen!
Please specify your gender, not specifying makes it harder to calculate but not impossible
Every body type is beautiful, which one is yours? :)
